page.title: 15Cafes and Tea-rooms.
page.content: Buddlets tea-room is on the A22 South of Maresfield.It is run by 6 people in part of a private house. It is very popular and attractive.It opened in 1982.They open from 11.am-6pm.They can seat 35 people and serve 180 people a day mostly familys and holidaymakers.They sell cream teas at Â£1.20,coffe 45p,soft drinks 40p,a popular meal like egg,sausge,baked beans,is Â£2.50.The Cabin is a cafe in Maresfied.The Cabin opens at 6am until 3.30pm.They serve a lot of lorry drivers. And they have about 350 customers a day.A cup of tea is 18p,a cup of coffe 25p.Egg,bacon and chips Â£1.60.It is the most popular food.The cafe is very clean and attractive.It seats 80 people in side.It is run by husband and wife and four helpers. by Alice and Amanda.
